##Competition Vehicle
```{r CompetitionVehicle}
# load(file="Data\\Defense_contract_CSIScontractID_complete.RData")


##Contract_SP_ContractUnmodifiedCompetitionvehicleCustomer.txt
def<-csis360::read_and_join_experiment(data=def
  ,"Contract.SP_ContractUnmodifiedCompetitionvehicleCustomer.txt"
  ,path=""
  ,"Data\\"
  ,by="CSIScontractID"
  ,new_var_checked=FALSE
)

#Contract.SP_ContractCompetitionVehicleCustomer.txt
def<-csis360::read_and_join_experiment(data=def
  ,"Contract.SP_ContractCompetitionVehicleCustomer.txt"
  ,path=""
  ,"Data\\"
  ,by="CSIScontractID"
  ,new_var_checked=FALSE
)


#Number of Offers
def$UnmodifiedNumberOfOffersReceived[def$UnmodifiedNumberOfOffersReceived==0]<-NA
def$NumberOfOffersReceived[def$NumberOfOffersReceived==0]<-NA
def$UnmodifiedNumberOfOffersReceived<-FactorToNumber(def$UnmodifiedNumberOfOffersReceived)
def$NumberOfOffersReceived<-FactorToNumber(def$NumberOfOffersReceived)
def$UnmodifiedNumberOfOffersReceived[is.null(def$UnmodifiedNumberOfOffersReceived)]<-NA
def$NumberOfOffersReceived[is.null(def$NumberOfOffersReceived)]<-NA

def$UnmodifiedNumberOfOffersReceived<-impute_unmodified(
  def$UnmodifiedNumberOfOffersReceived,
  def$NumberOfOffersReceived
)

def$Offr <- cut2(def$UnmodifiedNumberOfOffersReceived,cuts=c(1,2,3,5))



if (all(levels(def$Offr)==c("  1","  2","[  3,  5)","[  5,999]"))){
  def$Offr<-factor(def$Offr, 
    levels=c("  1","  2","[  3,  5)","[  5,999]"),
    labels=c("1","2","3-4","5+"),
    ordered=TRUE
  )
}




#Competition


#IsSomeCompetition Impute missing values when labeled entries have a consistent value.

def$UnmodifiedIsSomeCompetition<-impute_unmodified(
  def$UnmodifiedIsSomeCompetition,
  def$IsSomeCompetition
)


#Set is some competion = 1 when it is blank and there are multiple offers

def$UnmodifiedIsSomeCompetition[is.na(def$UnmodifiedIsSomeCompetition)&
    !is.na(def$UnmodifiedNumberOfOffersReceived)&
    def$UnmodifiedNumberOfOffersReceived>1
  ]<-1

#Set number of offers =1 when there is a NA and no competition
def$Offr[is.na(def$Offr)&
    !is.na(def$UnmodifiedIsSomeCompetition)&
    def$UnmodifiedIsSomeCompetition==0
  ]<-"1"

def$UnmodifiedNumberOfOffersReceived[is.na(def$UnmodifiedNumberOfOffersReceived)&
    !is.na(def$UnmodifiedIsSomeCompetition)&
    def$UnmodifiedIsSomeCompetition==0
  ]<-1


#Produce Comp factor
def$Comp[def$UnmodifiedIsSomeCompetition==0]<-"No Comp."
# def$Comp[def$UnmodifiedIsSomeCompetition=="Comp." &
#                            def$UnmodifiedIsFullAndOpen=="Not Full & Open"]<-"Comp."
# def$Comp[def$UnmodifiedIsSomeCompetition=="Comp." &
#                            def$UnmodifiedIsFullAndOpen=="Comp."]<-"Comp."
def$Comp[def$UnmodifiedIsSomeCompetition==1]<-"Comp."

def$Comp<-factor(def$Comp,
                               levels=c("No Comp.","Comp.")
                                                              )


#Produce EffComp factor

#Competition and Offer  
def$EffComp<-as.character(def$Comp)

def$EffComp[def$Comp=="Comp." & !is.na(def$Comp)]<-
  ifelse(def$UnmodifiedNumberOfOffersReceived[
    def$Comp=="Comp." & !is.na(def$Comp)]>1,"2+ Offers","1 Offer")

def$EffComp<-factor(def$EffComp,
                               levels=c("No Comp.","1 Offer","2+ Offers")
                               )


#Impute missing urgency values
def$UnmodifiedIsUrgency<-impute_unmodified(
  def$UnmodifiedIsUrgency,
  def$IsUrgency
)
#If there's competition, than the urgency exception wasn't used
def$UnmodifiedIsUrgency[is.na(def$UnmodifiedIsUrgency)&
                               !is.na(def$UnmodifiedIsSomeCompetition)&
                               def$UnmodifiedIsSomeCompetition==1]<-0


def$Urg[def$UnmodifiedIsUrgency==0]<-"Not Urgency"
def$Urg[def$UnmodifiedIsUrgency==1]<-"Urgency Except."
def$Urg<-factor(def$Urg,
                               levels=c("Not Urgency","Urgency Except.")
                               )

#Vehicle
#Award_Type_Code Impute missing values when labeled entries have a consistent value.
def$unmodifiedaward_type_code<-impute_unmodified(
  def$unmodifiedaward_type_code,
  def$Award_Type_Code
)

#idv_type_code Impute missing values when labeled entries have a consistent value.
def$unmodifiedidv_type_code<-impute_unmodified(
  def$unmodifiedidv_type_code,
  def$IDV_Type_Code
)


#Unmodifiedmultipleorsingleawardidc Impute missing values when labeled entries have a consistent value.
def$Unmodifiedmultipleorsingleawardidc<-impute_unmodified(
  def$Unmodifiedmultipleorsingleawardidc,
  def$multipleorsingleawardidc
)

#Assign Is IDV
#A = BPA Call, C = Delivery Order
def$IsIDV[!is.na(def$unmodifiedaward_type_code) &
                               def$unmodifiedaward_type_code %in% c("A","C")]<-1
#B = Purchase Order, D = Definitive Contract
def$IsIDV[!is.na(def$unmodifiedaward_type_code) &
                               def$unmodifiedaward_type_code %in% c("B","D")]<-0
def$IsIDV[!is.na(def$unmodifiedidv_type_code)]<-1

if(is.numeric(def$IsIDV)){
  def$IsIDV<-factor(def$IsIDV,levels=c(0,1),labels=c("Def/Pur","IDV"))
}


#Simple Vehicle, which consolidates IDV and award types
def$Veh[
  !is.na(def$unmodifiedaward_type_code) &
    def$unmodifiedaward_type_code %in% c("B","D")]<-"Def/Pur"


def$Veh[
  !is.na(def$unmodifiedidv_type_code) &
    def$unmodifiedidv_type_code %in% c("B") &
    !is.na(def$Unmodifiedmultipleorsingleawardidc)]<-
  paste(def$Unmodifiedmultipleorsingleawardidc[
     !is.na(def$unmodifiedidv_type_code) &
    def$unmodifiedidv_type_code %in% c("B") &
    !is.na(def$Unmodifiedmultipleorsingleawardidc)
  ],"IDC")

#IDV_type_Code D = BOA, E=BPA, Award_Type_code A=BPA Call
def$Veh[
  !is.na(def$unmodifiedidv_type_code) &
    def$unmodifiedidv_type_code %in% c("D","E") |
  !is.na(def$unmodifiedaward_type_code) &
    def$unmodifiedaward_type_code %in% c("A") 
    ]<-
  "BPA/BOA"
#IDV_type_cde A=GWAC C=FSS
def$Veh[
  !is.na(def$unmodifiedidv_type_code)
  & def$unmodifiedidv_type_code 
  %in% c('A','C')]<-"FSS/GWAC"

#Imputing that when Multiple Award/Single Award is known, but IDV_type_code is not
#that the vehicle type is an IDC
def$Veh[
  is.na(def$Veh)&
  is.na(def$unmodifiedidv_type_code) &
    !is.na(def$Unmodifiedmultipleorsingleawardidc)]<-
  paste(def$Unmodifiedmultipleorsingleawardidc[
  is.na(def$Veh)&
  is.na(def$unmodifiedidv_type_code) &
    !is.na(def$Unmodifiedmultipleorsingleawardidc)],"IDC")

def$Veh<-factor(def$Veh)
summary(def$Veh)
#Imputing that when the simple vehicle is a kind of IDV, IsIDV should follow as well
def$IsIDV[
  is.na(def$IsIDV)&
    def$Veh %in% c(
      'BPA/BOA','FSS/GWAC','MULTIPLE AWARD IDC','SINGLE AWARD IDC'
    )]<-"IDV"





def<-def[,!colnames(def) %in% 
    c(
  #     UnmodifiedIsFullAndOpen,
  # "UnmodifiedIsOnlyOneSource",
  "UnmodifiedIsFollowonToCompetedAction",
      "Unmodifiedmultipleorsingleawardidc",
        # "UnmodifiedIsUrgency",
      "Unmodifiedaddmultipleorsingawardidc",
  # "IsFullAndOpen",
  # IsOnlyOneSource 
  # "IsFollowonToCompetedAction"
    "IsUrgency",
      "multipleorsingleawardidc",
      "AddMultipleOrSingleAwardIDC",
  "Award_Type_Code",
  "unmodifiedaward_type_code",
  "IDV_Type_Code",
  # "UnmodifiedNumberOfOffersReceived",
  "unmodifiedidv_type_code",
  "NumberOfOffersReceived"
)]
str(def)
  
save(file="Data\\Defense_contract_CSIScontractID_complete.RData",def)

```


##Pricing
```{r Pricing}
# load(file="Data\\Defense_contract_CSIScontractID_complete.RData")

def<-csis360::read_and_join_experiment(data=def
  ,"Contract.SP_ContractPricingCustomer.txt"
  ,path=""
  ,"Data\\"
  ,by="CSIScontractID"
  ,new_var_checked=FALSE
)

#Process Fixed Or Cost
def$pIsFixedPrice<-percent_obligated(def,
                                          "ObligatedAmountIsFixedPrice",
                                            "Action.Obligation",
                                          "UnmodifiedIsFixedPrice",
                                          "IsFixedPrice")

def$pIsCostBased<-percent_obligated(def,
                                          "ObligatedAmountIsCostBased",
                                            "Action.Obligation",
                                          "UnmodifiedIsCostBased",
                                          "IsCostBased")


def$pIsCombination<-percent_obligated(def,
                                          "ObligatedAmountIsCombination",
                                            "Action.Obligation",
                                          "UnmodifiedIsCombination",
                                          "IsCombination")

def$pIsOtherFee<-percent_obligated(def,
                                          "ObligatedAmountIsOtherFee",
                                            "Action.Obligation",
                                          "UnmodifiedIsOtherFee",
                                          "IsOtherFee")


#Assign FxCb
def$FxCb[def$pIsFixedPrice>0  |
    def$pIsCostBased>0 | 
    def$pIsCombination>0 | 
      def$pIsOtherFee>0]<-"Combination or Other"

def$FxCb[def$pIsFixedPrice>=0.95|(def$IsFixedPrice==1 & (def$pIsCombination<=0.05 | is.na(def$pIsCombination)))]<-"Fixed-Price"
def$FxCb[def$pIsCostBased>=0.95|(def$IsCostBased==1 & (def$pIsCombination<=0.05 | is.na(def$pIsCombination)))]<-"Cost-Based"
def$FxCb<-factor(def$FxCb,levels=c("Fixed-Price","Cost-Based","Combination or Other"))
#Process Fee

View(subset(def,is.na(FxCb) & !is.na(FxCb)))
def$pIsIncentive<-percent_obligated(def,
                                          "ObligatedAmountIsIncentive",
                                            "Action.Obligation",
                                          "UnmodifiedIsIncentive",
                                          "IsIncentive")


def$pIsAwardFee<-percent_obligated(def,
                                          "ObligatedAmountIsAwardFee",
                                            "Action.Obligation",
                                          "UnmodifiedIsAwardFee",
                                          "IsAwardFee")



def$pIsFFPorNoFee<-percent_obligated(def,
                                          "ObligatedAmountIsFFPorNoFee",
                                            "Action.Obligation",
                                          "UnmodifiedIsFFPorNoFee",
                                          "IsFFPorNoFee")


def$pIsFixedFee<-percent_obligated(def,
                                          "ObligatedAmountIsFixedFee",
                                            "Action.Obligation",
                                          "UnmodifiedIsFixedFee",
                                          "IsFixedFee")





#AssignFee

def$Fee[def$pIsAwardFee>0  |
    def$pIsIncentive>0 | 
    def$pIsFFPorNoFee>0 |
      def$pIsFixedFee>0 |
      def$pIsOtherFee>0 |
      def$pIsCombination>0]<-"Combination"

def$Fee[def$pIsAwardFee>=0.9|(def$IsAwardFee==1
  & (def$pIsCombination<=0.05 | is.na(def$pIsCombination))) ]<-"Award Fee"
def$Fee[def$pIsIncentive>=0.9|(def$IsIncentive==1
  & (def$pIsCombination<=0.05 | is.na(def$pIsCombination)))]<-"Incentive"
def$Fee[def$pIsFFPorNoFee>=0.9|(def$IsFFPorNoFee==1
  & (def$pIsCombination<=0.05 | is.na(def$pIsCombination)))]<-"FFP or No Fee"
def$Fee[def$pIsFixedFee>=0.9|(def$IsFixedFee==1
  & (def$pIsCombination<=0.05 | is.na(def$pIsCombination)))]<-"Fixed Fee"
def$Fee[def$pIsOtherFee>=0.9|(def$IsOtherFee==1
  & (def$pIsCombination<=0.05 | is.na(def$pIsCombination)))]<-"Other Fee"


def$Fee<-ordered(def$Fee,
  levels=c("Incentive","Fixed Fee","Award Fee",
    "FFP or No Fee","Other Fee","Combination"))


summary(def$Fee)
summary(def$FxCb)
#Undefinitized Contract Awards
# def$Veh[def$AwardOrIDVcontractActionType == "Letter Contract"]<-"Letter"
# def$Veh[def$AwardOrIDVcontractActionType %in%
#     c("Indefinite Delivery Contract",
#       "Delivery Order")]<-
#   as.character(def$multipleorsingleawardidc[def$AwardOrIDVcontractActionType %in%
#       c("Indefinite Delivery Contract",
#         "Delivery Order")])


#Impute UCA unmodified values when consistent for the remainder of the vehicle
def$UnmodifiedIsUCA[is.na(def$UnmodifiedIsUCA)&
  !is.na(def$IsUCA)]<-
  def$IsUCA[is.na(def$UnmodifiedIsUCA)&
  !is.na(def$IsUCA)]



def$UCA<-factor(def$UnmodifiedIsUCA,
  levels=c(0,1),
  labels=c("Not UCA","UCA")
)

#Imputing to make up for absence of 
#There's no obligations in the dataset to UCAs using the regulated vehicle of FSS/GWAC
def$UCA[is.na(def$UCA)&
               def$Veh=="FSS/GWAC"]<-"Not UCA"
summary(def$UCA)
def<-def[,!colnames(def) %in% 
    c(
  # Pricing.Mechanism.Code,
  "UnmodifiedTypeOfContractPricing",
  "IsLabeledPricing",
  "ObligatedAmountIsFixedPrice",
  # IsFixedPrice,
  "UnmodifiedIsFixedPrice",
  "ObligatedAmountIsCostBased",
  # IsCostBased,
  "UnmodifiedIsCostBased",
  "ObligatedAmountIsCombination",
  # IsCombination,
  "UnmodifiedIsCombination",
  "ObligatedAmountIsIncentive",
  # IsIncentive,
  "UnmodifiedIsIncentive",
  "ObligatedAmountIsAwardFee",
  # IsAwardFee,
  "UnmodifiedIsAwardFee",
  "ObligatedAmountIsFFPorNoFee",
  # IsFFPorNoFee,
  "UnmodifiedIsFFPorNoFee",
  "ObligatedAmountIsFixedFee",
  # IsFixedFee,
  "UnmodifiedIsFixedFee",
  "ObligatedAmountIsOtherFee",
  # IsOtherFee,
  "UnmodifiedIsOtherFee"
  # pIsFixedPrice,
  # pIsCostBased,
  # pIsCombination,
  # pIsIncentive,
  # pIsAwardFee,
  # pIsFFPorNoFee,
  # pIsFixedFee,
  # pIsOtherFee,
  # FxCb,
  # Fee,
    )]

str(def)

save(file="Data\\Defense_contract_CSIScontractID_complete.RData",def)
```
